item.title: Deploy and Run the Application
item.description:
Click the down arrow to the right of the Debug or Run icons and select helloworld_configuration.The deployment server starts and the Console view displays the output of the deployment server. The deployment server starts a node, deploys the application to the node, and starts the application. The application is ready to receive requests when the console displays
INFO: Successfully started debugging application 'upgrade.helloworld.soa'
OK
